name: LD47 - Hide, Seek, Die, Repeat!
description:
You are a Des-Tro-Bot, a bio-hybrid enforcer, specifically constructed by the species "Twiggs" for your one and only mission: Destroying a human habitat on their planet "Marz".

Your mission is clear but anything far from easy. Your only way to fulfill your order is manipulating the nuclear reactor near the entrance. Unfortunately there are several security measures applied. You will have to find a way to disable them in advance.

Of course the human people left some guardian robots in and near the habitat so you job won't be easy. Unluckily your mind is stuck in a loop, so that even if they destory your bio-hybrid body, your memories will always be transferred back into a new Des-Tro-Bot and you will have to continue your mission. There is no way out (except a Rage-Quit).

You should try not to die too often as dieing will give the guardian bots a chance to repair some of the damage you made.

Controls:

  • WASD / Left Stick -> Movement
  • F/E (Controller: A) -> Interact (Destroying things is done by holding F/E)
  • Escape (Controller: Menu) -> Give up (hold) / Close Dialog

Hint: If you want to destroy a switchboard, hold Interact while standing near it.

This game has been created within less than 72 hours during Ludum Dare Jam 47 from scratch.
